text: Badabandha Road railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Badabandha Road. Its code is BDBA. It has two platforms. Passenger, MEMU and Express trains halt at Badabandha Road railway station. ==Major Trains== * Paradeep − Puri Intercity Express ==See also== * Jagatsinghpur district ==References== Category:Railway stations in Jagatsinghpur district Category:Khurda Road railway division
title: Badabandha Road railway station
